definition.content:
The ability to selectively apply security while continually monitoring for threats on both requests and responses is the centerpiece of the WAF.

Gain comprehensive visibility into your organization's web application security by monitoring F5 DCS Web Application Firewall (WAF) Event logs with this dashboard.

For Further reading, see:

- [F5 Distributed Cloud Services Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/f5-distributed-cloud/)

Tips
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates WAF logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security).
